enterprise.title: Identity & Context-Aware Control Plane
enterprise.description: Enforces policy dynamically based on user identity, role, device posture, application context, and session state.

enterprise.title: AI Prompt & Output Governance
enterprise.description: Governs AI prompts and outputs in-browser, including data classification, redaction, blocking, and downstream usage controls.

enterprise.title: Extension Governance
enterprise.description: Controls, restricts, and monitors browser extensions, injected scripts, and in-page API behavior.

enterprise.title: Action-Level Evidence & Telemetry
enterprise.description: Captures structured, action-level records of user and AI activity for investigations, audits, and compliance.

enterprise.title: Centralized Management
enterprise.description: Offers centralized admin console or management plane

enterprise.title: Configuration Policies
enterprise.description: Supports pushing various settings through Group Policy or MDM tooling

pricing_models.title: Freemium
pricing_models.description: Free tier available with paid upgrades

pricing_models.title: Per Seat
pricing_models.description: Pricing based on number of users/seats
